A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Had some very very good parts. There was a disgusting amount of unnecessary comic relief that created awkward pacing as well as ruined the mood of entire scenes. Plus some very hefty plot armor on several characters. This movie came close to making a huge step away from the norm that these Disney backed movies fall into\, but in the end fell victim to the same problems that suck the life out of the Disney movies.
